mapper.select: SELECT g.id, g.good_name, g.good_price, g.good_img, mg.stock_count, mg.start_date, mg.end_date, mg.miaosha_price FROM miaosha_good mg LEFT JOIN good g ON mg.good_id = g.id

SELECT good.id, good.good_name, good.good_img, good.good_price, mg.`start_date`, mg.`end_date`, mg.`miaosha_price`, mg.`stock_count` FROM miaosha_good mg LEFT JOIN good ON good.id = mg.good_id WHERE mg.`good_id` = ${goodId}
